title: Largest Safe Snow Patch
description: Given an n×n grid of 'S' (safe) and 'I' (unsafe) cells, find the size of the largest connected safe region using 4-directional adjacency.
input_format: Line 1: integer n. Next n lines: grid rows containing 'S' or 'I'.
output_format: Single integer: size of the largest safe region.

sample_tests.explanation: Largest connected safe component has 6 cells.
